title: Posh cheese on toast with apple compôte and baby beetroot salad
description: A delightfully melty cheese tastes divine on sourdough toast, served here with a classy compôte and salad.
ingredients: 200g/7oz firm cow's cheese, (such as Ogelshield), sliced
3 Braeburn apples, peeled, cored and chopped
1 bunch baby beetroots, cut into quarters
